AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key for S3 storage.

AWS_S3_FILE_OVERWRITE.description: Allow S3 storage to overwrite files.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Key for S3 storage.

CYBERSOURCE_REFERENCE_PREFIX.description: a string prefix to identify the application in CyberSource transactions

EDXORG_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the edX instance to use for logging in.

EDXORG_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID configured in the edX instance.

EDXORG_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret configured in the edX instance.

ELASTICSEARCH_HTTP_AUTH.description: Basic auth settings for connecting to Elasticsearch

ELASTICSEARCH_URL.description: URL for connecting to Elasticsearch cluster

EXAMS_AUDIT_NACL_PUBLIC_KEY.description: NaCl public key for encrypting audit files

EXAMS_SFTP_USERNAME.description: Username for Pearson SFTP server authentication

EXAMS_SFTP_PASSWORD.description: Password for Pearson SFTP server authentication

EXAMS_SFTP_UPLOAD_DIR.description: Upload directory for files we send to Pearson

FEATURE_OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_USER_SYNC.description: Enables creation and syncing of open-discussions user data

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing Google services

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Value provided by Heroku containing the app name (eg micromasters-ci)

HEROKU_PARENT_APP_NAME.description: Value provided by Heroku containing the parent app name (eg micromasters-ci for a PR build)

MAILGUN_KEY.description: The token for authenticating against the Mailgun API

MAILGUN_URL.description: The URL used to connect with Mailgun

MICROMASTERS_CORS_ORIGIN_WHITELIST.description: List of origins to allow CORS requests from (e.g. ['otherhost.com', 'myhost.edu'])

MICROMASTERS_DB_DISABLE_SS_CURSORS.description: Disable server-side cursors to avoid issues with pgbouncer

MICROMASTERS_ENVIRONMENT.description: The execution environment that the app is in (e.g. dev, staging, prod)

MICROMASTERS_LOG_LEVEL.description: The logging level for the application

MICROMASTERS_USE_S3.description: Use S3 for storage backend (required on Heroku)

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: If false, disables the node_modules cache to fix yarn install

OAUTH_MAINTENANCE_MODE.description: If true, on login redirects to a static page with message

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_API_USERNAME.description: The username to use for authentication Open Discussions

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_BASE_URL.description: The base url for Open Discussions

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_COOKIE_NAME.description: The name of the cookie to set the JWT token on

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_COOKIE_DOMAIN.description: The domain to set the JWT token cookie on

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_JWT_EXPIRES_DELTA.description: How long the JWT cookie should live before expiration

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_JWT_SECRET.description: The JWT secret to be shared between MicroMasters and Open Discussions

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_REDIRECT_URL.description: The URL to redirect the uer to for the discussions site

OPEN_DISCUSSIONS_SITE_KEY.description: The site key to use for discussions JWT tokens

OPEN_EXCHANGE_RATES_APP_ID.description: The app ID for the open exchange rates API

PARAMIKO_LOG_LEVEL.description: The log level for the paramiko logger

STATUS_TOKEN.description: Token to access the status API.
